news_header: Tens of thousands of Palestinians have fled military operations in the West Bank, marking significant displacement since 1967.
news_original_title: Thousands of Palestinians flee West Bank homes as Israel confronts militants
news_text: Recent Israeli military operations in the West Bank have led to the largest displacement of Palestinians since the 1967 Mideast war, with over 40,100 fleeing their homes. Humanitarian officials warn of worsening conditions in refugee camps, drawing parallels to historical events. Many families report being ordered to leave by Israeli forces, facing destruction of their homes and infrastructure.
